summary: A texture recolor for the nightingale armor to make it appear to be more like steel plate. Male and female versions available.
descriptionHtml:
Hello all, 
     
     While playing around one night with Exium\'s recolor of the nightingale armor i got the inspiration to make my own version. I like most people love the look of the Nightingale armor because it\'s a more supernatural armor and the look of it is absolutely beautiful and quite elegant if you look at some of the finer details. I honestly reminded me of something you would see in a batman comic/movie/cartoon. I usually like to play as a warrior running around in a full set of ebony or a custom armor mod/compilation, but i would always make that exception for the Nightingale armor. Even though i play as a warrior i do understand the merits and benefits of being a stealth character with the sneaking and lock picking. Now i can run around as a shadow warrior with a little more emphases on the warrior aspect because sometimes it\'s just more fun to jump into (or start one ;) ) a melee and train wreck a group of enemies. This file will replace the default nightingale texture for you and anyone who wears the armor. 

This is my first mod attempt and i think the textures came out rather well all things considered. i hope you all enjoy it :).

update 10/20/2013 female version is now available :) 

Add this file to your textures folder in the data folder of your Skyrim install or installing by using NMM.

Mods used in Images: 
Heavy Nightingale armor (best use is for this mod.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28337//?

Bandolier - Bags and Pouches (i wonder if someone can make this in a nightingale style texture.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438//? 

Silver Crossbow
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29089//?

Leather Backpack (i wonder if someone can make this in a nightingale style texture too)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13732//?
author: U653748
